alert.note: Alert for Garland; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 11 at 8:16PM CDT until April 11 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL GARLAND...CENTRAL SALINE AND WESTERN PULASKI COUNTIES... At 816 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 2 miles north of Lonsdale, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Benton... Hot Springs Village... Crows... Bland... Owensville... Grape... TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
